meanings.definition: A group of fat-soluble vitamins that includes vitamin D2 and vitamin D3.
meanings.sent1: Calciferols are essential for maintaining strong bones and teeth.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend supplements containing calciferols for better health.
meanings.sent3: The calciferols decided to throw a party in the stomach to celebrate their benefits.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the effects of calciferols on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The importance of calciferols in our diet cannot be overstated.

meanings.definition: Any of various forms of vitamin D.
meanings.sent1: Calciferols play a crucial role in regulating calcium levels in the body.
meanings.sent2: Sun exposure is a natural way to increase your intake of calciferols.
meanings.sent3: The calciferols in the bottle whispered to each other about their benefits.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge on the different types of calciferols was as vast as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The impact of calciferols on overall health is remarkable.
